description.paragraph_1: Guess the hidden word in five attempts.
description.paragraph_2: Each attempt must be a valid 5-letter word.
description.paragraph_3: After each attempt the color of the letters changes to show how close you are to guessing the word.
description.paragraph_4: There may be repeated letters. The clues are independent for each letter.

section_examples.title: Examples
section_examples.example_1: The letter G is in the correct word and position.
section_examples.example_2: The letter C is in the word but in the wrong position.
section_examples.example_3: The letter O is not in the word.
